details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.7.3 Document Information Dictionary - Title and dc:title
details.description: The value of Title entry from the document information dictionary, if present, and its analogous XMP property dc:title['x-default'] shall be equivalent.

rule.description: The value of Title entry from the document information dictionary, if present, and its analogous XMP property dc:title['x-default'] shall be equivalent.

error.message: The value of Title entry from the document Info dictionary and its matching XMP property dc:title['x-default'] are not equivalent (Info /Title = %1, XMP dc:title['x-default'] = %2)
